com.inrix.sdk.utils

Class UserPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.utils.UserPreferences

  • public final class UserPreferences
extends Object
    Utility class to store/retrieve global user preferences for example preferred units.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UserPreferences.Unit
      Units for expressing distances.

    • Method Detail

      • loaded

        public static boolean loaded()
        Check if the preferences are loaded into memory.
        Returns:
        true if loaded, false otherwise.

      • getInstallationIdHash

        public static String getInstallationIdHash()
        Get the installation ID hash.
        Returns:
        The installation ID hash, or null if not persisted.

      • getSettingUnits

        public static UserPreferences.Unit getSettingUnits()
        Get the preferred distance units defined by UserPreferences.Unit. Unless the settings are explicitly set using UserPreferences.setSettingUnits(Unit), this method will return the units appropriate for the current device locale.
        Returns:
        The preferred distance units.

      • setSettingUnits

        public static void setSettingUnits(UserPreferences.Unit unit)
        Set the preferred distance units.
        Parameters:
        unit - The preferred distance units. null will remove this preference and default to appropriate units based on locale.

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Clear all user info.

      • getStringSetting

        public static String getStringSetting(String settingName)
        Generic get string setting. This method will be used by other classes that want to retrieve a stored String setting.
        Parameters:
        settingName - The name of the setting.
        Returns:
        The setting value or null if setting not found.

      • getStringSetting

        public static String getStringSetting(String settingName,
                      String defaultValue)
        Generic get string setting. This method will be used by other classes that want to retrieve a stored String setting.
        Parameters:
        settingName - The name of the setting.
        defaultValue - The value returned when the setting is not found.
        Returns:
        The setting value or the defaultValue if setting not found.

      • setStringSetting

        public static void setStringSetting(String settingName,
                    String settingValue)
        Generic set string setting. This method will be used by other classes that want to store a String setting
        Parameters:
        settingName - A non null name of the setting
        settingValue - The setting value

      • getLongSetting

        public static long getLongSetting(String settingName)
        Generic get long setting. This method will be used by other classes that want to retrieve a stored long setting.
        Parameters:
        settingName - The name of the setting.
        Returns:
        The setting value 0 if setting not found.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • hasSetting

        public static boolean hasSetting(String settingName)
        Checks whether the provided setting is stored within the settings.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if the value exists, false otherwise.
